Name: You've Got Mail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
7.5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.
Review: Superbly refreshing - cachaça and citrus with flavoursome honeyed richness, invigorated with sparkling wine.
History: Adapted from Dave Wondrich 's riff on the classic Airmail .
Nutrition: One serving of You've Got Mail contains 219 calories
